description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edge of civilization
starting_equipment: Two shortswords or two simple melee weapons

level_1_features.name: Favored Enemy
level_1_features.description: Choose a type of favored enemy: aberrations, beasts, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, giants, monstrosities, oozes, plants, or undead. Gain advantage on tracking and recalling information about them

level_1_features.name: Natural Explorer
level_1_features.description: Choose a favored terrain. Gain benefits when traveling for extended periods in that terrain
